channel.title: Eggplant on Enjoyable Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Eggplant on Enjoyable Recipes

item.title: Shorshe Begun Kankra
item.description: Today is the last day of Durga Puja. Sumi and I stayed home whole day. So to spend her holiday she cooked. That woman surprises me with her patience and cooking. She cooked fish, chicken and crab. Now I don’t like crabs much but Sumi swears by them. I was surprised with the result though. It was a very traditional Bengali way of preparation and was delicious. I never realized crabs would taste so good to me.
